enableExecution.title: Enable Execution
enableExecution.description: Enable pipeline execution and kernel usage.

componentPalette.title: Enable Top Component Palette
componentPalette.description: Enabling this option places the component palette at the top of the pipeline canvas.

enableDebugMode.title: Enable Debug Mode
enableDebugMode.description: Enable debug mode provide additional messages in the console.

enableTelemetry.title: Enable Telemetry
enableTelemetry.description: Enable telemetry used to improve user experience and product performance.

defaultEngineBackend.title: Default Engine for File Browser files
defaultEngineBackend.description: This parameter defines which backeng engine is used by default when drag and dropping files form the file browser onto the canvas.
